aws_pinpoint_apns_sandbox_channel.description: Provides a Pinpoint APNs Sandbox Channel resource.

enabled.description: Whether the channel is enabled or disabled. Defaults to `true`.

default_authentication_method.description: The default authentication method used for APNs Sandbox.

certificate.description: The pem encoded TLS Certificate from Apple.

private_key.description: The Certificate Private Key file (ie. `.key` file).

bundle_id.description: The ID assigned to your iOS app. To find this value, choose Certificates, IDs & Profiles, choose App IDs in the Identifiers section, and choose your app.

team_id.description: The ID assigned to your Apple developer account team. This value is provided on the Membership page.

token_key.description: The `.p8` file that you download from your Apple developer account when you create an authentication key.

token_key_id.description: The ID assigned to your signing key. To find this value, choose Certificates, IDs & Profiles, and choose your key in the Keys section.
